website_summaries.verdict: Platform sneaker that adds a bit of height.
pros: Sporty silhouette in suede or textile that has a dedicated fan following for comfort and style
cons: Some reports of the sole separating after a few months of wear

customer_reviews.title: Insanely Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These may be the perfect shoes. I tried these on in a department store, but they didn't have the dark gray velvet, so Amazon to the rescue! They run true to size (I'm a 6-6 1/2 and the 6 1/2 fit perfect) and feel like walking on clouds. I am petite, so I appreciated the slight height of the platform style and the cut is very flattering--kind of makes your foot and your legs appear longer and slimmer. I have had strangers stop me to compliment me on these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: SpeedyE30M3

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is glued, not stitched
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. On an important day of walking, the body of the shoe where one slides their foot in to came apart from the base. Apparently the shoe is glued, not stitched. The stitching one sees is fake. Very disappointed. Would like refund- very expensive. For this price, should not have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable To Wear All Day.
customer_reviews.text: Received the shoes ahead of time. Inside the shoe box was a very nice note stating if I had any concerns or problems how I can contact the business . This is my second pair. I just love these shoes. They are so comfortable! I like the thickness of the sole as it provides shock absorption which helps my back pain. The shoes are attractive. I feel like I am not wearing just a pair of sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Janney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful casual sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I’ve had them for months and I feel so happy walking in them. They add some nice height, and look classy/casual. I got them in white, and they have gotten a bit dirty, but I absolutely adore these shoes! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: W. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, Sexy in their own way, So Comfotable , Worth Every Penny. LOVE LOVE these shoes. Plus I'm a huge Suede FAN. I bought the Dark grey Suede !! Highey Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! It's a fun style and looks great with jeans, leggings or tank dresses. I ordered 9.5, and it fit just as expected; the toe box was slightly snug, but I expect it to loosen up over time. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Vivid K | Life. Love. Home.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sneaks
customer_reviews.text: I wore out my previous pair of Vinces and was thrilled to find the same ones online. I get lots of compliments when I wear them -- and always feel a little taller and cuter when they're on.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Solange ✨

customer_reviews.title: Traps Heat, Stiff and Creates Blisters
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these shoes for so long and finally ordered them and I have to say I’m dissapointed. They look great but feel pretty stiff. They give me blisters not only on the bottom of my feet and the backs and they are super hot, trapping heat. Because of this, they are really not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Goldfayn

customer_reviews.title: Prefer less expensive Steve Madden sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the hype or price. I returned his for Steve Madden ones I love! These aren’t as comfortable as those.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieB_Well

customer_reviews.title: Can't decide on size.........
customer_reviews.text: Runs smaller than most vince, had higher vamp also for slipping on shoe
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine M.

customer_reviews.title: Walking on Air
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit true to size and it's like walking on air. They are so comfortable, stylish and easy slip on/off. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I tried other less expensive versions and always come back to these. As with other Vince brand items, great quality!! Good for narrow feet!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi

customer_reviews.title: Chic and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these, wear them pretty much every other day....(I alternate them with my other Vince sneaker slip-ons) . Makes me wonder why I didn't start wearing sneakers all the time years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Sand

customer_reviews.title: Not the shoe I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I got a completely different Shoe than what I was supposed to get according to the description I have been searching for the shoe everywhere and this is not the platform the box even says a different version of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Coming OFF!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom part of this sneaker is coming off like a cheap shoe! I have only worn these sneakers a few times and the bottom is already coming off. For such an expensive shoe I am BEYOND DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, but the quality of product is bad. The rubber on the bottom started coming apart within a week and even though it hasn’t been a year, the fabric is looking quite worn. I take great care of my shoes, in general and I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: angelia cho

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are great to pull on and go! Very comfortable and look great with straight jeans.
customer_reviews.author: JEG

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable after the first day of course. Love these. I got white. They match everything. Love the thick sole For A bit of height.
customer_reviews.author: Smac

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by the Vince brand
customer_reviews.text: Had these shoes less than 1 month and worn about 8 times. The shoe upper is separating from the sole. Super comfortable, but horrible quality from a luxury brand. Wish I would have purchased through Zappos or at Nordstrom as I could return them without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. Fit great, very comfortable. Ordered a second pair for her in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: TW-South Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Plan to buy the next size as soon as I get credit. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ellen H.

customer_reviews.title: I have a wide foot and these are great.
customer_reviews.text: Very comphy walking shoes. I have a wide foot and these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J.

customer_reviews.title: So cute and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable and fit perfect! I was so excited to see them on amazon and at a cheaper price then other sites! Love, love them!
customer_reviews.author: John Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Great price and so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: A little long, but that is my fault for ordering a 7.5 versus a 7. I still love them and I don't mind a little extra room. I have a few pairs of these and they are stylish and comfortable. I recommend ordering your normal size in the leather/suede and sizing up a half size in the ones with the fabric ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Liz

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable! I’ve never had blisters breaking these shoes in! I wear them all the time, and they are great for work or play! Plus there are so many colors to Choose from! I love these so much, that I have 5 different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 10.5; the 10 fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. Don't order a size up if you are a 10.5 as the 11 is way too big. The 10 actually fits perfectly. Enjoy these great sneakers! Definitely worth the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Look great, less comfortable than expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected to love these shoes, but I didn't. They look great, but they were not all that comfortable. The back of the shoe hit my foot at a weird spot, and they are very flat. No arch support at all. I tried using a little orthotic insole but it made it too tight (not length wise but height wise) so it went back.
customer_reviews.author: AB123

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes fit TTS I am 8 with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes fit TTS I am 8 with a little bit of a wide foot but these fit perfect so cute got in off white and I love !
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: atrocious
customer_reviews.text: These are, without a doubt, the ugliest shoes I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jackson

product_meta.title: Vince Women's Warren Platform Sneakers
product_meta.description: A bold 40mm sole boosts a street-chic sneaker in a sleek, sporty silhouette.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
